title: Cricket Performance Analytics Dashboard (Tableau)
short: Interactive Tableau dashboard analyzing 1000+ T20 match records
long: Built an interactive Tableau dashboard analyzing 1000+ T20 match records sourced from Kaggle. Performed data cleaning and preprocessing using Python and Excel to improve dataset consistency by 25%. Developed performance KPIs including Runs, Strike Rate, Boundary %, Economy Rate, and Phase-wise Contribution. Enabled comparative player performance evaluation and match trend identification using dynamic filters.

title: Player Scouting & Performance Benchmarking Model â€“ T20 Format
short: Multi-metric player ranking model for T20 cricket
long: Designed a multi-metric player ranking model using Strike Rate, Boundary %, Dot Ball %, Economy Rate, and Consistency Index. Built role-based benchmarking frameworks for Top-order Batters, Finishers, and Death-over Bowlers. Conducted phase-wise segmentation (Powerplay, Middle Overs, Death Overs) to assess situational efficiency.
screenshotCaptions: Batting Average vs Strike Rate Analysis

title: Cricket Win Probability Prediction
short: Real-time win probability prediction model for T20 matches
long: Developed a prediction model to calculate the real-time win percentage of teams during IPL matches based on historical ball-by-ball data. Engineered custom features such as wicket-fall flags and cumulative runs to improve model accuracy. Created dynamic visualizations to track win probability fluctuations throughout the duration of a match.
